revised_title: A New Approach to Sturm-Liouville Series
tldr: The author presents a new method for approximating Sturm-Liouville series using integral equations instead of differential equations. The method involves dividing the domain into sub-intervals and finding a local average of the function in each interval. The author demonstrates that this approach can provide accurate approximations with controlled error, making it a valuable tool for studying Sturm-Liouville series.
